name: Shaverino
description:
Welcome to the Barber Shop Shaveroni. In this game, you are the barber.

In Free Play mode you can spend all the time that you want to design your own personal beard.

In Game Mode You have five customers that all want unique beards. Your task is to shave their beard and try to make it match their desired look. Each customer as unique requests. But be careful, you only have 30 seconds per customer.

You move the tool that you have selected by moving the mouse around, remember to hold down the left mouse button to shave and cut. If you want to, you can also change the size of the tools and rotate them.

To resize them you use the scroll wheel and to rotate them you hold down “Shift” on the keyboard and use the scroll wheel. If you are satisfied with the beard that you have shaved and want to bring on the next customer, you can press the “space bar” on the keyboard.

You are scored depending on how accurate your beard and you get bonus if you finish quickly.

Good luck!
